data.text:
Hi @yasserogier,

Only the Attorney vs Data Exception Report is a new one. The rest are on report central already.

What this report is for, is to see if a case verified on attorneys CourtWorks matches a case on capturing CourtWorks and whether it was verified before or after the case on capturing CourtWorks. I also need to see how many cases captured on attorney CourtWorks are not matched to cases on capturing CourtWorks.

Essentially this is to see if attorney CourtWorks is really contributing or not.
